title: How to Check Your <gradient>Instagram Unfollowers</gradient>
subtitle: Follow these 8 simple steps to securely analyze your account without sharing your password.
openStepAria: Step {{step}}: {{title}}. Click to open in guide

1.title: Open Instagram Export Page
1.description: Click the button to open Meta Accounts Center. Then click "Create export" to begin the process.

2.title: Choose Your Instagram Profile
2.description: Select your Instagram account from the list of connected profiles in the Accounts Center.

3.title: Select "Export to device"
3.description: Choose to export directly to your device. This keeps your data private and secure.

4.title: Select Only "Followers and following"
4.description: Click "Customize" → Clear all → Check ONLY "Followers and following". This keeps your file compact.

5.title: Set Date Range to "All time"
5.description: Click "Date range" → Select "All time" → Save. This ensures complete follower history.

6.title: Change Format to JSON
6.description: Critical step! Click "Format" → Select "JSON" (not HTML). HTML files will NOT work.

7.title: Review & Start Export
7.description: Verify settings: Followers and following, All time, JSON. Then click "Start export".

8.title: Wait for Email & Download
8.description: Instagram emails you when ready (5-30 min). Download the ZIP file from the email link.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.subtitle: Scan and process your Instagram data export privately in seconds.

schema.name: How to Check Who Unfollowed You on Instagram Without Login
schema.description: Step-by-step guide to find Instagram unfollowers using your official data export. No login required, 100% private local processing.
